name: Costamare Inc.
description: Costamare Inc. is a leading provider of containerships for charter. Founded in 1974, the company has established a strong reputation in the shipping industry by focusing on the operation of a diverse fleet of modern vessels. With a focus on long-term charters, Costamare operates a fleet of containerships that are among the largest and most technologically advanced in the world. The company aims to provide high-quality shipping services to its customers while maintaining a commitment to safety, efficiency, and environmental responsibility. Costamare's fleet includes a mixture of vessels that cater to different segments of the shipping market, allowing the company to effectively serve a wide range of clients, including major shipping lines and logistics companies. The company is headquartered in Athens, Greece, and has a global presence, enhancing its ability to respond to the needs of its customers. With a focus on strategic partnerships and a strong balance sheet, Costamare continues to expand its operations and invest in new vessels, positioning itself for long-term growth in the competitive maritime industry.

seo.meta_title: Costamare Inc. | Leading Provider of Containerships
seo.meta_description: Costamare Inc. is a premier provider of containerships for charter, operating a fleet of modern vessels. Discover more about our services, fleet, and commitment to the maritime industry.

faq.question: What does Costamare Inc. do?
faq.answer: Costamare Inc. operates a fleet of containerships for charter, providing shipping services to major shipping lines.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Costamare Inc.?
faq.answer: Gregory Zikos is the CEO of Costamare Inc.

faq.question: Where is Costamare headquartered?
faq.answer: Costamare is headquartered in Athens, Greece.

faq.question: What types of vessels does Costamare operate?
faq.answer: Costamare operates a fleet of containerships, including newbuilding and time-chartered vessels.
